topic.title: i wish add the (google)translate feature as tw&fb,and put the 中文论坛（chinese)in to the forefront.
topic.body:
Cuz whether in the regular internet or 0net ( in fact ,cn users take up the maximum number of people among the 0net users,for some "Irresistible reasons"), en users and cn users take up the most number of internet.Can you give an example that famous websites except en(google,bing,fb,twitter,youtube,reddit) and cn(baidu,tieba,douban,taobao,weibo,) Can you?welcome to offer me some foreigner website.
I found the dansk ( after the en on the top bar) just posted three post now(maybe i didnt linked to  all peers),the is bullshit.dont talking about what"zh ...the 'z' is the last letter in the alphabet," 
Obviously ,english is 1st before dansk on the top bar,and "d" susposed to be before "e".am i wrong? if it is,message me on my websites ,common named ....eh...the universal url format is////imchenjiaojiao.blogspot.com.or imchenjiaojiao.wordpress.com.some like.if you cant recognize chinese,google translate will help you,you trash.
Thats all.i dont browse 0net usually,so msg me on my sites ,if you think i offened you offened your family.Dont reply me on 0net,cuz im going offline.bye bye~y'all nasty boys!

topic.title: 我操你妈怎么发布到中文论坛里了，这他娘的不是搞歧视吗？
topic.body: 我日他娘的，还他娘的专门给中文在主论坛开一个区，我日你妈卖批！WHAT THE FUCK'IN IS THIS？我要求你们赔偿我的肛交权！让我肛爆英文论坛！他妈老娘用零网的时候，还没有这个主论坛特别开的中文论坛呢。我他妈淦爆！

1510821243_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDm.body:
> [tiotry](#comment_4_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDmSjHM5): in the board ,just English OK? I need a partner to use English ,not just to know it, and I can't approach reddit.com either （i don't know if it's because GFW）.

no,the fucking gov never banned those sites,as well as yahoo japan,wikipedia(expact chinese-like language),...many,once most chinese cant read it.recently xvideos and pornhub has unlocked,LOL，i always wonder why dont many sites be banned by gov.

> [tiotry](#comment_9_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDmSjHM5): I didn't noticed your ID，using English is to prevent English speakers neglecting the post .so , can you delete all your replies in Chinese ?I can talk to you in Chinese board ...using  Chinese .

怎么删除？你能找到删除按钮吗？

> [tiotry](#comment_5_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDmSjHM5): your English is quite well !( in my opinion ),then why would you say  "don't learn English" ?

学英语上课听听就行了，别把玩的时间用来憋英语。

> [tiotry](#comment_13_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDmSjHM5): You didn't get what i am saying. Not just to learn English as a language , I'd like to possess English thinking.

你可拉倒吧！尼玛你还“you'd like to prossess english thinking"，你他妈要是能学会了，我将“千里送菊”——把我的屁眼免费给你肛。立下微博地址，以此为证！：https://weibo.com/eniaoiao
just close ur ass,the cum is going down;i'll make it alright,before ur husband come back.
